wikipedia_page.main: Jessica Steele (9 May 1933 – 23 November 2020) was a British author of 88 romance novels that spanned a career over four decades, Her novels have been published by Mills & Boon since 1979 starting with The Icicle Heart. Her last novel was  The Girl From Honeysuckle Farm and it was published in 2009.
